parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the new resource group. You can view the available resource groups in the Resource Management console.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource. The value of this parameter varies with the resource type. For example, if you set ResourceType to cluster, this parameter specifies a cluster ID.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to cluster.
